input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is MOM2005Adapter

items The items XML that will be used to create the alert. Sample: <items> <!--1 or more--> <operation-parameter> <related-id>632c4a2c-1e31-4097-a332-847bcb52bb62</related-id> <name>MOM Adapter Testing Alert</name> <computer-name>S-17124</computer-name> <computer-domain>S-17124</computer-domain> <description>MOM Adapter Testing Alert</description> <severity>Error</severity> <owner-name>MOM Adapter</owner-name> <custom-field-1>CustomField1</custom-field-1> <custom-field-2>CustomField2</custom-field-2> <custom-field-3>CustomField3</custom-field-3> <custom-field-4>CustomField4</custom-field-4> <custom-field-5>CustomField5</custom-field-5> <source>BMC</source> <resolution-state>0</resolution-state> <problem-state>Investigate</problem-state> <component>Connector</component> <component-instance>Connector</component-instance> <server-role>MOM Server</server-role> <server-role-instance>S-17124</server-role-instance> </operation-parameter> </items>
Description of fields that can come in process-options xml:-
related-id [Optional] Represents the Id of the related alert in the master configuration group. name The name of the alert computer-name The name of the computer computer-domain Domain to which the computer belongs description [Optional] The alert description severity The severity of the alert owner-name [Optional] The account name that owns the alert custom-field-1 [Optional] The first user-defined field custom-field-2 [Optional] The second user-defined field custom-field-3 [Optional] The third user-defined field custom-field-4 [Optional] The fourth user-defined field custom-field-5 [Optional] The fifth user-defined field source [Optional] The name of the Windows service that was the source of the alert resolution-state The state of the alert problem-state [Optional] The values that specify the current state component [Optional] The name of the component or feature within the application that caused the alert. component-instance [Optional] The name of a particular instance of the component or feature within the application that caused the alert server-role [Optional] The role of the computer server-role-instance [Optional] The name of the instance of the role
